TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PatchSettings extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PatchSettings class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string patchMode) cil managed
Public Sub New (Optional patchMode As String = Nothing)

Docs.param:
Specifies the mode of in-guest patching to IaaS virtual machine.

Possible values are:

**Manual** - You control the application of patches to a virtual machine. You do this by applying patches manually inside the VM. In this mode, automatic updates are disabled; the property WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates must be false

**AutomaticByOS** - The virtual machine will automatically be updated by the OS. The property WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates must be true.

** AutomaticByPlatform** - the virtual machine will automatically updated by the OS. The properties provisionVMAgent and WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates must be true. Possible values include: 'Manual', 'AutomaticByOS', 'AutomaticByPlatform'
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PatchSettings class.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.PatchMode : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets specifies the mode of in-guest patching to IaaS virtual machine.<br /><br /> Possible values are:<br /><br /> **Manual** - You control the application of patches to a virtual machine. You do this by applying patches manually inside the VM. In this mode, automatic updates are disabled; the property WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates must be false<br /><br /> **AutomaticByOS** - The virtual machine will automatically be updated by the OS. The property WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates must be true. <br /><br /> ** AutomaticByPlatform** - the virtual machine will automatically updated by the OS. The properties provisionVMAgent and WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates must be true. Possible values include: 'Manual', 'AutomaticByOS', 'AutomaticByPlatform'
